name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Detail-oriented Senior Frontend Engineer with over 10 years of experience in crafting high-performance web applications using **React**, **Next.js**, **JavaScript**, and **TypeScript**. Proven expertise in developing responsive user interfaces that prioritize accessibility and usability, ensuring a seamless product experience. Adept at working with APIs and proficient in utilizing tools such as **Postman** for testing and integration. Recognized for strong product thinking and meticulous attention to design details, driving impactful solutions that align with user needs.
Possesses a solid foundation in full stack development, having implemented applications with **Flutter**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Demonstrated capability in cloud application deployment on **Azure** and **AWS**, and experience with microservices architecture and event-driven systems. Committed to continuous improvement and innovation, leveraging CI/CD automation techniques to enhance development workflows.
